articles.title: ‘A-posh-trophe’ joke wins London school pupils a posh trophy
articles.description: Year 5 children’s punctuation pun scoops top prize in the Beano’s Britain’s Funniest Class competition
articles.content:
A joke about punctuation has been chosen as the funniest in a competition run by the Beano comic.
Year 5 pupils at Riverley primary school in Leyton, east London, won the accolade with their joke: What do you call the fanciest punctuation? An a-posh-... [2318 chars]

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 smashes record as company's fastest-selling console
articles.description: TOKYO :Japan's Nintendo said on Wednesday it had sold more than 3.5 million Switch 2 units in the first four days after its launch, making the console the company's fastest-selling gaming device to date.
